Quick Start

Register a user and fetch an auth token, or use an API key for integrations.

POST /api/auth/register
{
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "password": "secure_password",
  "first_name":"John",
  "last_name":"Doe",
  "phone_number":"+1234567890"
}

Use the returned access_token as:

Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token_here>

Or use a permanent API key in header:

X-Api-Key: rRUae4R0.bXuDA8d0AiabriqJUKHSkrSz04otMdIN

Authentication

We support JWT for users (short lived) and permanent API keys for server-to-server.

JWT
3 day expiry
API Keys
SHA-256 hashed in DB, shown only once
